name: Space Journey - Asteroid Attack
description:
Are you ready to go on an incredible journey with space ship? This is an incredible challenge game, where you have to make never-ending journey to the edge of space! Collect stars on the way, they will help you become the best explorer!
Avoid planets and asteroids - when faced with them, you will end your trip very quickly! For every 40 points you get immortality and be able to survive one collision with an object.
In fact, you will not be able to hold on for a few seconds.
It's your challenge! Accept it and become the best!
